As snowboards provide a larger contact surface than skis, they are great for off-pist skiing.

Riding a ski lift on a snowboard is less straightforward than on skis. The board must slide forward, requiring the body to remain diagonal towards the lift.

Inexperienced boarders tend to sit on the snow a lot. This poses two challenges; getting into the way of other skiers and boarders, and soaking their pants.
